test.instr: (:ins (:info (on X Y) (:cond (sort X cup) (color X blue) (sort Y desk))) (:info (on X Y) (:cond (sort X bottle) (color X blue) (sort Y television))) (:info (opened X) (:cond (sort X refrigerator))) (:info (closed X) (:cond (sort X microwave))) (:task (pickup X) (:cond (sort X book) (color X white))) (:task (putin X Y) (:cond (sort X can) (color X green) (sort Y refrigerator))) (:task (putin X Y) (:cond (sort X book) (sort Y closet))) (:task (puton X Y) (:cond (sort X bottle) (color X blue) (sort Y sofa))) (:task (putdown X) (:cond (sort X bottle) (color X white))) (:task (goto X) (:cond (sort X teapoy))) (:cons_not (:task (goto X) (:cond (sort X desk)))) )
test.nl: There is a cup which is blue on the desk. There is a bottle which is blue on the television. The door of the refrigerator is opened. The door of the microwave is closed. Pick up the white book. Put a can which is green in the refrigerator. Put a book in the closet. Put the blue bottle on the sofa. Put down the white bottle. Go to the teapoy. Do not go to the desk.
